name: solar
description: Solar irradiance simulation on external surfaces
author: christophwaibel

components.name: EaCSPanel
components.description: Calculates total annual PV yield, using simplified equation E_PV = G x F_F x A x eta_PV x PR, from the lecture Energy and Climate Systems.

inputs.name: Global_Irradiation
inputs.description: Annual Global Irradiation, annual in [kWh/m²a]

inputs.name: FormFactor
inputs.description: Form factor, also known as orientation factor, that defines how much of the global annual irradiation is effectively used, depending on the angle of the PV surface. Fractional value [0.0, >1.0]

inputs.name: SurfaceArea
inputs.description: Surface are in [m²]

inputs.name: PVEfficiency
inputs.description: PV technology efficiency, fractional value [0.0, 1.0]

inputs.name: PerformanceRatio
inputs.description: Performance Ratio, depends on how well the PV is exposed (shaded, not) and how clean it is (dirty, dusty, super clean). Fractional [0.0, 1.0]

outputs.name: annual yield
outputs.description: Annual yield for solar electricity generation [kWh/m²a] of the entire PV area

components.name: SimplePanel
components.description: Calculates solar irradiance on an unobstructed external surface

inputs.name: tilt
inputs.description: Panel tilt in degree

inputs.name: azimuth
inputs.description: Panel azimuth in degree

inputs.name: DHI
inputs.description: Diffuse Horizontal Irradiance time series, 8760 values in [W/m²] from a weatherfile.

inputs.name: DNI
inputs.description: Direct Normal Irradiance time series, 8760 values in [W/m²] from a weatherfile.

inputs.name: latitude
inputs.description: Latitude of the location. Default value is for Zurich, Switzerland

inputs.name: longitude
inputs.description: Longitude of the location. Default value is for Zurich, Switzerland

inputs.name: solarazi
inputs.description: 8760 time series of solar azimuth angles in [°], e.g from a weatherfile. If no data provided, azimuth will be calculated according to Blanco-Muriel (2001).

inputs.name: solaralti
inputs.description: 8760 time series of solar altitude angles in [°], e.g from a weatherfile. If no data provided, altitude will be calculated according to Blanco-Muriel (2001).

outputs.name: annual potential
outputs.description: annual hourly solar irradiance [Wh/m²] of panel

components.name: ObstructedPanel
components.description: Calculates solar irradiance on obstructed building surface.

inputs.name: mesh_analysis
inputs.description: Analysis surface as rhino grasshopper mesh

inputs.name: obstructions
inputs.description: Obstructions as rhino grasshopper mesh objects

inputs.name: DHI
inputs.description: Diffuse Horizontal Irradiance time series, 8760 values in [W/m²] from a weatherfile.

inputs.name: DNI
inputs.description: Direct Normal Irradiance time series, 8760 values in [W/m²] from a weatherfile.

inputs.name: latitude
inputs.description: Latitude of the location. Default value is for Zurich, Switzerland

inputs.name: longitude
inputs.description: Longitude of the location. Default value is for Zurich, Switzerland

inputs.name: solarazi
inputs.description: 8760 time series of solar azimuth angles in [°], e.g from a weatherfile. If no data provided, azimuth will be calculated according to Blanco-Muriel (2001).

inputs.name: solaralti
inputs.description: 8760 time series of solar altitude angles in [°], e.g from a weatherfile. If no data provided, altitude will be calculated according to Blanco-Muriel (2001).

outputs.name: annual potential
outputs.description: annual hourly solar irradiance [Wh] of surface

inputs.name: G_flat
inputs.description: Global irradiation, i.e. on the flat, in [kWh/m2a]

inputs.name: G_angled
inputs.description: Irradiation on an angle in [kWh/m2a]

inputs.name: performance_scenario
inputs.description: Scenario for performance ratio, like dirty roof, clean facade, shaded roof, etc

inputs.name: PV_tech
inputs.description: Choose PV technology
